about_the_game:
Tulips & Windmills is a charming and lighthearted clicker/idle game that immerses you in the iconic Dutch culture! 🌷✨

Grow your tulip empire as you upgrade your windmill, cultivate vast tulip fields, and unlock the true potential of the Netherlands' most beloved exports. Choose between manually harvesting tulips or hiring skilled gardeners to do the work for you.

Join our Discord server to help design the game further and stay updated. The link is on the right!

You start with a manual multiplier but get ready for much more! From autoclicker speed and effectiveness over fields and gardener upgrades, make sure to spend your tulips wisely!

At some point, your automation may exceed your manual labor skills, watch your empire flourish while silently expanding and upgrading. See your progress as the tulip fields in the background get populated.

Gardeners will help you harvest your fields, they become quicker and quicker! I promise! They will speed to your fields.

Boost your production with unique Dutch-themed events like King’s Day or brave the infamous Kut Weer! (bad weather) to turn challenges into opportunities. Upgrade your windmill to increase its speed and efficiency, and watch your tulip fields flourish with ever-growing profits. With every decision, you’ll get one step closer to creating the ultimate Dutch tulip dynasty!

  • Multipliers: Upgrade your windmill and tulip fields to maximize profits and speed.

  • Dutch Events: Celebrate King’s Day, endure bad weather, or embrace the holiday spirit with Sinterklaas.

  • Up for a challenge? Change the language to Dutch and see if you can still find all the buttons.

  • Steam Achievements: Unlock fun and unique milestones as you grow your tulip empire.

  • Save or Reset: Choose to save your progress and continue where you left off before or reset your progress and start from the beginning. Supports Steam Cloud Saves.

Whether you're a fan of idle games or just want to bask in the cheerful and vibrant world of tulips and windmills, Tulips & Windmills is the perfect game to spend time and enjoy life!

Wishlist now!

name: Tulips & Windmills

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-supported
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10-supported
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Hoi! Ensure your windmill runs consistently and your tulip fields are harvested. This clicker game will bring you closer to the iconic Dutch culture. Expect random events and make use of upgrades to increase your tulip wealth! Veel succes!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Dutch, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
